name: Get Rich or Sink
description:
Made in 72 hours for Ludum Dare 40: The more you have, the worse it is. 

There's a hole in your ship, and you have to save up for a new one. But the more gold you loot, the faster it sinks. How will you deal with that? 

Hope you'll enjoy our small game!

WASD - control boat;
SHIFT - pick up gold;
LMB - shoot.

OST on Bandicam: https://ronemmitt.bandcamp.com/album/get-rich-or-sink
